com.esri.gpt.control.filter
Class LocaleFilter

java.lang.Object
  com.esri.gpt.control.filter.LocaleFilter
All Implemented Interfaces:
Filter
public class LocaleFilter
extends Object
implements Filter

Locale filer. It will set a correct locale depending on the user session or the cookie.
The filter must be configured in web.xml with one initialization parameter: "locale-method". This parameter accepts two types of values:

  • cookie:<cookie name> - for locale configuration in the cookie
  • cookie:<session parameter name> - for locale configuration in the session parameter
Content of the cookie or value of the attribute must be a valid locale id like: "en" for english, "fr" for french, etc.
